home.welcome: Welcome to the KrUltra Runners Hub!

mo.title: Malvikingen Opp
mo.tagline: Malvik's oldest fell race – from Fjord to Våttan since 2011.
mo.taglineShort: Earn your 'Mal-Viking' title in Malvik's oldest fell race.
mo.aboutText: Malvikingen Opp runs from Vikhammerløkka to Solemsvåttan. The length is 6 km, and the elevation difference between start and finish is 420 meters.
mo.courseDesc: 6 km from the fjord at Vikhammerløkka to the top of Solemsvåttan.
mo.elevationDesc: The course starts approx. 3 meters above sea level and finishes at 423 m. Except for a small downhill after about 2 km, it's uphill almost the entire way.
mo.classesDesc: The race has competition classes with women's and men's categories, but what makes the race unique is the main class for all-against-all where time is adjusted for age and gender. Additionally, there's a timed recreational class and a family-friendly hiking class.
mo.since2011Desc: Malvikingen Opp is Malvik's oldest fell race and is organized by KrUltra on behalf of Malvik IL Friidrett. The race has been held every year since 2011.
mo.registrationInfoDesc: Links to registration and information about deadlines are published in the relevant edition – follow the link to the next race for details.
mo.competitionTimedDesc: Participation costs 250 NOK. One-day license is additional for runners without an annual license.
mo.oneTimeLicenseNote: Required for runners without an annual license in competition classes
mo.depositNote: Returned to all participants who show up for the race

kutc.title: Kruke's Ultra-Trail Challenge
kutc.taglineShort: Find your distance. Find your limit.
kutc.aboutText: Kruke's Ultra-Trail Challenge is a multi-loop ultra trail race on the border between Malvik and Trondheim.
kutc.lastOneStanding: All participants are part of the 'Last One Standing' challenge!
kutc.allParticipantsLOS: All participants are part of the 'Last One Standing' challenge!
kutc.depositNote: Returned to all participants who show up for the race
kutc.footerNote: For detailed race information, please visit the
